title: Ekko and changes needed
body: I find ekko a very fun champ but he is very op and im expecting a nerf, although i want to say that his skin and default skin- the copy of ekko when he has his ult up, is very hard to see, especially in team fights. Maybe riot can make it so its brighter or something that makes it more visible to the eye.

replies.body: I gotta say, in normals when there are 2 ekkos, with 2 clones walking, man its easy to lose track of which teams is which.
He'll get nerfs regardless as his damage is stupid rn. BUT you're definitely on to something about his copy being too hard to see. Making it brighter might just fix it.
